ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Chi-square statistic with variance set to 1.

DESC.PARA:
The leastsq statistic is equivalent to chi2constvar
("ahelp chi2constvar"), except the variance is always set to 1.
Set the fitting statistic and then confirm the new value.

BUGS.PARA: See the bugs pages on the Sherpa website for an up-to-date listing of known bugs.
